name: Fic's Adventure 2: 6 Golden Trick Coins
description: Meet Fic Shunfite (Again) A sarcastic treasure hunter hunting pirates who stole his treasure 2 seconds ago. With more speedrun potential, "Secret" Trick Coins, and "more" tricks to pull off, this'll be a fun game that'll make you say "Didn't I play this before?" and you did if you played the first one.
